entries.meaning: Loose stones on hillsides deposited by weathering.

verbs.description: clitter (third-person singular simple present clitters, present participle clittering, simple past and past participle clittered)

entries.meaning: To clatter lightly; to make a soft rattling noise.
examples: Howard  [â€¦]  was even more aware of something else. A clittering sound. It was coming from behind him, and it was getting closer.
